meanings: the key[essential] point of a question

vlive.korean: 급소? A vital point? 듣기 View video HYOMIN : [FULL] HYOMIN ‘MANGO’ SHOWCASE
귀가 급소냐고요? Are ears pressure points? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 아이엠 보고 싶었어요
나 급소 맞는 것 같아. I think it's hitting my vital point. 듣기 View video FANTAGIO MUSIC : 헬로비너스의 한강 먹방♡
vlive.english: I think it's hitting my vital point.

vlive.korean: 급소 공격 안 되고요. - 오케이. Don't attack the important part. - OK. 듣기 View video MIXNINE : 핵꿀잼! 빛나는 소년들의 <믹나 체력장>
vlive.english: Don't attack the important part. - OK.

vlive.korean: 급소나 얼굴로 향하는 것들이 많아요. It is aimed a lot towards your face and your pressure points. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 현빈X유해진X김주혁X임윤아 <공조> 무비토크 라이브 'Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: It is aimed a lot towards your face and your pressure points.
